introText: Discover affordable tools and products for DIY mechanics through my Walmart storefront. Every purchase helps support my content creation journey while saving you money on quality automotive supplies!

banner.title: Budget-Friendly Auto Tools
banner.description: Walmart offers great value for DIY mechanics on a budget. I've handpicked these items for their quality-to-price ratio to help you save money without sacrificing functionality.

categories.title: Affordable Must-Have Tools
categories.description: Budget-friendly tools that deliver great performance for common automotive tasks.

products.name: Basic Tool Kit
products.description: 145-piece home repair kit with carrying case

products.name: Mechanic Creeper
products.description: Six-wheel design for smooth movement under vehicles

products.name: Oil Change Kit
products.description: Complete kit with drain pan, funnel, and disposal bag

categories.title: Safety Gear & Protection
categories.description: Essential safety equipment to keep you protected during maintenance and repairs.

products.name: Disposable Nitrile Gloves
products.description: Box of 100, oil and chemical resistant

products.name: Mechanic Safety Kit
products.description: Includes glasses, ear protection, and dust mask

categories.title: Car Care & Maintenance Products
categories.description: Keep your vehicle in top condition with these affordable maintenance products.

products.name: Wall Storage System
products.description: Complete garage wall organization kit with hooks and baskets

products.name: Tool Storage Cabinet
products.description: Mobile tool chest with multiple drawers and work surface

products.name: Storage Shelf Unit
products.description: Heavy-duty steel shelving for garage organization

categories.title: Garage Organization Solutions
categories.description: Get ready for the Caveman's Garage Overhaul with these affordable storage and organization solutions.

products.name: Parts Organizer
products.description: Multi-drawer storage cabinet for small parts and tools

products.name: Pegboard Organization Kit
products.description: Complete pegboard system with hooks and accessories

products.name: Garage Storage Bins
products.description: Set of 6 stackable bins with lids for organized storage
